attributes.title: This is the worst app there is
attributes.review: This app took a week to download and it made my phone glitch. My cats didn’t like the orange man either. It is rude and disrespectful to all the apps out there.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download!! Has caused my phone to glitch so much and put viruses on my phone. It also asks racist questions when you sign up!! Do not download this app!!

attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.title: I want Obama back
attributes.review: I was a big trump supporter and my family loved him. We took hate from his name. I love you trump  but ever since I gained common sense, I’ve realized what a big bigot you are. Yayyy. Btw no one likes you🧚🧚❤️✨✨

attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.title: I HATE IT
attributes.review: So I opened the app and it told me it doesn’t accept Hispanics only whites so I had to delete the app and then he threaten to attack me if I didn’t vote for him he made my little sister scream of how orange his face is 💔😤

attributes.title: black lives matter
attributes.review: this app is terrifying! especially when you use it at 3 am 😳 a bunch of rodents and leaches started shivering out my phone and went to eat me! i thankfully fought them off, but i was hardly alive. i had to be rushed to the hospital because i had low blood pressure. not to mention it only has 2 stars, so you know it’s bad. terrible app

attributes.title: Terrible app
